products.name: Omega Art Suite Pro
products.description: The ultimate collection of 100+ high-resolution digital assets, including textures, brushes, and 3D models. Perfect for professional artists and designers. Commercial license included.

products.name: AI-Powered Content Generator

instructions.notes: Please include your Order ID (from receipt) in the KPay payment reference.
Send to Binance UID. A transaction screenshot after payment is highly recommended.

adminNote.title: Important Notice from Admin
content: Welcome! All digital product deliveries are processed after payment confirmation via Telegram.
Our current support hours are 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM (GMT+7). Inquiries or payments made outside these hours will be addressed on the following day.
Please ensure you provide the correct details during payment and when contacting us on Telegram.

faq.question: How quickly will I receive my product?
faq.answer: Once your payment is confirmed on Telegram, products are typically delivered within 5-30 minutes during our operational hours. For payments outside these hours, delivery will be on the next business day.

faq.question: What if I have trouble with my payment?
faq.answer: If you encounter any issues during the payment process, please take a screenshot and contact us immediately on Telegram using the link provided on the receipt page. We'll assist you as quickly as possible.
